map_description: Gungnir-Class Battlecruisers were designed from the ground up as a counter to the Kadesh-Class cruiser in cooperation with Ethereal engineers formerly of the Dominion of Light. While budget constraints have prevented all of its intended armament from being installed, early reports indicate that the battlecruisers remain functional even after losing 90% of their atmospheric integrity
strengths: Heavy Gun Armament, Heavy Armor, Redundant Atmospherics and Power
